title: Did a Craigslist Ad Seek ‘Minority Actors’ for Trump’s Tulsa Rally?
subtitle: Twitter sleuths connected a Craigslist ad for paid minority actors to an upcoming Trump rally in Tulsa, Oklahoma.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: A Craigslist ad offered to pay "minority actors" to hold signs at a Trump rally in Tulsa, Oklahoma on June 20, 2020.
